RecipeDef.label: small mechanical research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on various mechanical fields. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on mechanical subjects. Requires: 75 Steel, 3 Components.

RecipeDef.label: Medium mechanical research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on various mechanical fields. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on mechanical subjects. Requires: 500 Steel, 10 Components, 10 Gold.

RecipeDef.label: Large mechanical research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on various mechanical fields. Will greatly help advance the colony's knowledge on mechanical subjects. Requires: 750 Steel, 15 Components, 50 Plasteel, 25 Gold.

RecipeDef.label: small textiles research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on various textile assembly trades. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items from fabrics and cloths. Requires: 50 Leather.

RecipeDef.label: small cultural research project
RecipeDef.description: A small research project based on anthropology. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items that will provide social benefits for colonists and lords. Requires: 75 Leather.

RecipeDef.label: medium cultural research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on anthropology. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items that will provide social benefits for colonists and lords. Requires: 100 Leather, 50 steel, 1 component.

RecipeDef.label: large cultural research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on anthropology. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the creation of various items that will provide social benefits for colonists and lords. Requires: 150 Leather, 200 steel, 5 components.

RecipeDef.label: Small biological research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on the biological sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on various fields, such as farming and botany. Requires: 100 Raw plant matter.

RecipeDef.label: Medium biological research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on the biological sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the flora and fauna of this alien world. Requires: 400 Raw plant matter, 30 Insect Jelly.

RecipeDef.label: Large biological research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on the biological sciences. Will greatly advance the colony's knowledge on advanced biological fields. Requires: 800 Raw plant matter, 100 Insect jelly.

RecipeDef.label: Small construction research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on basic construction techniques. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on building structures. Requires: 200 Wood, 50 Steel.

RecipeDef.label: Medium construction research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on intermediate construction techniques. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on building more complex structures. Requires: 100 Any stone block, 100 Steel, 300 Wood.

RecipeDef.label: Large construction research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on advanced construction techniques. Will greatly advance the colony's knowledge on building the most complex structures. Requires: 300 Any stone block, 400 Steel, 550 Wood.

RecipeDef.label: Small metallurgy research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on metallurgy. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of basic metal products. Requires: 300 Steel.

RecipeDef.label: Medium metallurgy research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on metallurgy. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of advanced metal products. Requires: 400 Steel, 15 Jade, 15 Gold.

RecipeDef.label: Small weaponry research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on the art of combat. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of weaponry. Requires: 150 Steel, 200 Wood.

RecipeDef.label: Medium weaponry research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on the art of combat. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of slightly advanced weaponry. Requires: 800 Steel, 35 Uranium, 7 Components.

RecipeDef.label: Large weaponry research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on the art of combat. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of highly advanced weaponry and armour. Requires: 1000 Steel, 100 Uranium, 100 Gold, 100 Jade, 10 Components.

RecipeDef.label: Small electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on the usage of electricity. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the small-scale usage of electricity. Requires: 400 Steel, 7 Components.

RecipeDef.label: Medium electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on electrical engineering. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of medium-scale electrical structures. Requires: 400 Steel, 200 Chemfuel, 10 Components.

RecipeDef.label: Large electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on electrical engineering. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of advanced, large-scale electrical structures and products. Requires: 800 Steel, 400 Chemfuel, 15 Components, 50 Gold.

RecipeDef.label: Essential electrical research project
RecipeDef.description: A research project based on harnessing the power of electricity. Will provide essential stepping stones in electrical research for the colony. Requires: 1000 Steel, 25 Uranium, 25 Gold, 10 Components.

RecipeDef.label: Small medical research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on medical sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of basic medical products. Requires: 30 Herbal Medicine.

RecipeDef.label: Medium medical research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on medical sciences. Will help advance the colony's knowledge on the production of advanced medical products and techniques. Requires: 35 Herbal Medicine, 100 Cloth, 10 Neutroamine.

RecipeDef.label: Large medical research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on medical sciences. Will greatly advance the colony's knowledge on the production of highly advanced medical products. Requires: 50 Neutroamine, 45 Ambrosia, 120 Devilstrand.

RecipeDef.label: Small advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: A small-sized research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with highly advanced products and structures. Requires: 75 Synthread, 100 Plasteel, 10 Components.

RecipeDef.label: Medium advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: A medium-sized research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with highly advanced products and structures. Requires: 250 Plasteel, 15 Components, 75 Synthread, 120 Chemfuel.

RecipeDef.label: Large advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with large-scale advanced technologies. Requires: 100 Synthread, 30 Components, 200 Chemfuel, 200 Plasteel.

RecipeDef.label: Essential advanced research project
RecipeDef.description: An essential research project based on high-end industrial technologies. Will provide the colony with vital technologies that will provide stepping stones to further projects. Requires: 100 Synthread, 25 Hyperweave, 30 Components, 200 Plasteel, 1 Techprof Subpersona Core.

RecipeDef.label: Large spacer research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on Glitterworld technologies. Will provide the colony with technologies only found on Glitterworlds. Requires: 500 Plasteel, 100 Uranium, 100 Gold, 50 Hyperweave, 10 Advanced Components.

RecipeDef.label: Large spacecraft research project
RecipeDef.description: A large research project based on scavenged spacecraft parts and various visiting spaceships. Will provide the colony with spacecraft construction capabilities. Requires: 750 Plasteel, 20 Advanced Components, 500 Chemfuel, 1 Techprof Subpersona Core.

RecipeDef.label: Large ultratech research project
RecipeDef.description: A substantial research project based on technologies observed and scavenged from the Shattered Empire that has colonised this world. Requires: 750 Plasteel, 20 Advanced Components, 500 Chemfuel, 1 Techprof Subpersona Core.

RecipeDef.label: Mod research project
RecipeDef.description: A research project based on rumours and knowledge passed on from visitors. Will provide the colony with unique, bespoke research projects. (This experiment will unlock any random non-vanilla research project). Requires: 750 Silver.
